welcome_message_body: Welcome to Batang, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cin Long Restaurant
restaurants.description: Cin Long Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: Dupan Square (Jalan Dr. Soetomo), Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: RM H.Subali (Raja Sate)
restaurants.description: RM H.Subali (Raja Sate) is a satay restaurant located in Kecamatan Pekalongan Timur.
restaurants.address: Jl. Raya Batang-Pekalongan, Kecamatan Pekalongan Timur, Jawa Tengah 51123

restaurants.name: Sego Dalem
restaurants.description: Sego Dalem is a indonesian restaurant located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: Jl. Dr. Sutomo (Depan Terminal Baru Pekalongan), Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: RM. Sop Buntut Bu Leman
restaurants.description: RM. Sop Buntut Bu Leman is a soup spot located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: Jalan Dr. Wahidin No. 90D, Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah

restaurants.name: Soto PPIP Bu Bawon
restaurants.description: Soto PPIP Bu Bawon is a soup spot located in Pekalongan.
restaurants.address: Jl. Dr. Wahidin Sudiro Husodo, Pekalongan, Jawa Tengah 51129
